title: A question on Hellenic Wide
content:
Which typeface pairs very well with Hellenic Wide?

Thanks in advance.

-R
author: RJClouse

comments.content:
This is not a marriage institute for loneley fonts!!!

Sorry but without any context the question is IMHO pretty nonsensical.

Andreas

Pfft — I'll play matchmaker. ;)

I've seen it "in the wild" paired with Futura (both Book and Condensed) and Trade Gothic... and a quick search on Flickr came back with examples of both. So maybe try those?
